#id=1
#text=I am an avid reader so I am always on the lookout for the next best story of nonfiction !
#id=2
#text=My buddy , Frank , told me about the new library that was opening up about a mile away from my house and I thought this was a great opportunity to be able to borrow some free books !
#id=3
#text=I drove down and was in awe at how big the place was .
#id=4
#text=As I stepped inside and began to browse I realized that not only did they have books but they had video games , DVDs , and music you could rent as well .
#id=5
#text=After spending about half an hour in there just browsing I finally came upon a book I wanted to read : The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy !
#id=6
#text=I grabbed the book and went up to the counter .
#id=7
#text=The nice librarian said that I would first have to get a library card so I could rent out my book .
#id=8
#text=I filled out the paper work and she handed me a shinny new library card !
#id=9
#text=I rented my book and she told me that I was due by a week from today .
#text=I went back home and got started on my reading adventure .
